description: Thereâ€™s a new feature available exclusively to our clients with Gold Level Websites! For each of your gold placements on the Justia Lawyer Directory, you can now create a custom tagline (up to 80 characters) and description (up to 220 characters) to help your profile stand out among the competition. Leverage the power of our high-traffic lawyer directory to help you get quality leads and grow your business.
Contact your account manager to learn more or to upgrade your website to the Gold level.
